mainText:
Although I did not know you personally, I felt as though you knew me.  
What you did was  help me become more comfortable with technology by 
keeping your products simple enough for me to understand and use.  You 
kept me, the customer, in mind the entire time when developing and 
designing your products.  And for this, I want to say thank you and you 
will truly be missed!
author: Romona
